channel.title: Running Server Error. :(
channel.description:
when i click on run server thi comes up :S
The World Of Macofis is now online _______________________
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4 at NPCManager.loadAutoSpawn(NPCManager.java:2127) at NPCManager.<init>(NPCManager.java:21) at Server.main(Server.java:28)
Can someone help me ?

item.title: Running Server Error. :(
item.dc:creator: @wat72 wat72
item.description:
@wat72 wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:261614”]NPCManager class. You put a space instead of a tab.[/quote]No, that would result in a formatting error nor an arrayindexoutofbounds error.

Read full topic
